title: Momoiro Sisters
synopsis: Momoko is a high school student, trying to live up to her older sister Sakura. Sakura works in an office along with many other co-workers. The two sisters, and their friends, experience the everyday hardships and situations of being a woman.
staff: [['Watanabe, Jun', ['Sound Director']], ['Sokuza, Makoto', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kurata, Hideyuki', ['Script']], ['Akahori, Satoru', ['Script']]]
